course.subject: MARK
course.name: Doing Business in China
course.description: This course will provide a high level overview on the operating environment in the China market today, and to underscore the challenges and solutions faced by company executives whose aim is to capture market opportunities in China. The course will begin with an overall understanding of the cultural background of today's Chinese consumers, address market entry obstacles peculiar to China, and focus on executional elements ranging from sales team management to distribution and supply chain options. The instructor will use case studies to facilitate learning from mistakes and best practices, and will draw on the instructor's personal experience and insights to enhance knowledge sharing.
